QuestData.Title: Playing Along
QuestData.Description: My kill! You take my kill!$B$B<Gekgek taunts you with his spear.>$B$BYou dumb, $r. Now you owe Gekgek! You be Frenzyheart slave. You slay many more beasts for Frenzyheart.$B$BYou go Frenzyheart Hill to northeast - you tell High-Shaman Rakjak you the new slave.$B$BGo, $r! Go or I taunt you a second time!$B$B<Gekgek waves his spear around menacingly.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to High-Shaman Rakjak at Frenzyheart Hill as the new "slave."
QuestData.RewardText: You the new slave?$B$BGood. We running out.
